name: Planetary Defender (itch)
description:
You control a turret in orbit around the earth and must shoot down the invading aliens. The turret is controlled with the gyroscope in your phone or tablet so  you will need to physically turn and look up and down.

Originally made for a competition, an older version can be found on Google Play and the App Store.

Feedback is welcome as this may or may not become a full project in the future.
